faqs.question: Where is my order?
faqs.answer: You can track your order using the tracking number sent to your email. Visit our tracking page at harmoneymusic.com/track and enter your order number. Orders typically arrive within 3-5 business days.

faqs.question: How long does shipping take?
faqs.answer: Standard shipping takes 3-5 business days. Express shipping (available at checkout) takes 1-2 business days. International orders take 7-14 business days depending on customs.

faqs.question: Can I change my shipping address?
faqs.answer: If your order hasn't shipped yet, we can update your address. Please contact us immediately with your order number and new address. Once shipped, address changes must be made through the carrier.

faqs.question: My tracking shows delivered but I didn't receive it
faqs.answer: Please check with neighbors, building management, or any alternate delivery locations. Sometimes packages are marked delivered before actual drop-off. If you still can't locate it after 24 hours, contact us with your order number and we'll file a claim with the carrier.

faqs.question: What is your return policy?
faqs.answer: We offer 30-day returns on most items. Products must be in original condition with all accessories and packaging. To initiate a return, visit harmoneymusic.com/returns with your order number. Return shipping is free for defective items.

faqs.question: How do I return a defective product?
faqs.answer: For defective items: (1) Take photos/video of the defect, (2) Contact us with your order number and media, (3) We'll send a prepaid return label, (4) Ship it back within 30 days. Full refund or replacement will be processed within 5 business days of receiving the return.

faqs.question: When will I get my refund?
faqs.answer: Refunds are processed within 5 business days after we receive your return. The refund will go back to your original payment method. Bank processing may take an additional 3-5 business days to reflect in your account.

faqs.question: Can I exchange instead of return?
faqs.answer: Yes! We offer free exchanges within 30 days. Simply indicate the item you'd like instead when initiating your return. We'll ship the replacement as soon as we receive your return. If there's a price difference, we'll refund or charge accordingly.

faqs.question: What warranty do guitars come with?
faqs.answer: All guitars include a 2-year manufacturer warranty covering defects in materials and workmanship. This includes fret issues, neck problems, and electronic failures. Normal wear, accidental damage, and modifications are not covered.

faqs.question: How long is the warranty on amplifiers?
faqs.answer: Amplifiers come with a 1-year manufacturer warranty. Extended warranties (up to 3 years) are available at checkout. Warranty covers manufacturing defects but not damage from misuse, power surges, or unauthorized repairs.

faqs.question: Does this guitar come with a case?
faqs.answer: It depends on the model. Entry-level guitars ($200-$500) typically include a gig bag. Mid-range ($500-$1500) usually include a hard case. Premium guitars ($1500+) always include a hard shell case. Check the product description for specifics.

faqs.question: Is this guitar good for beginners?
faqs.answer: Guitars marked 'Beginner Friendly' in our catalog are specifically chosen for new players. Look for features like: comfortable neck profile, lower action, lighter weight, and affordable price point. Our staff can also provide personalized recommendations - just ask!

faqs.question: What's the difference between acoustic and electric guitar?
faqs.answer: Acoustic guitars have hollow bodies that project sound naturally - no amplifier needed. Electric guitars have solid bodies and require an amplifier. Acoustics are great for folk, country, and unplugged settings. Electrics offer more versatility with effects and are essential for rock, metal, and jazz.

faqs.question: Do you have left-handed guitars?
faqs.answer: Yes! We stock left-handed versions of popular models. Filter by 'Left-Handed' on our guitar category page. If a specific model isn't available left-handed, we can special order it (usually 2-4 weeks delivery).

faqs.question: What size guitar should I get for my child?
faqs.answer: Age 5-7: 1/4 size (30-34 inches), Age 8-11: 1/2 size (34-36 inches), Age 11-13: 3/4 size (36-38 inches), Age 13+: Full size (38-40 inches). However, height and hand size matter more than age. We recommend visiting our store for proper sizing.
